akn:section.akn:heading: Career and Educational Services retention rights.

akn:content.akn:p: In the event the individual resumes employment with the District government, the entire time during which the employee was receiving compensation under this subchapter shall be credited to the employee for the purposes of within-grade step increases, retention purposes, and other rights and benefits based upon length of service.

Nothing in this provision shall exclude the responsibility of the employing agency to re-employ an employee in a full-duty or part-time status.
